content: k n i t t i n g c lu b sweater bare knit 1 all images illustrations and text © bare knit the knitting club sweater - details - this is the most basic and easy to make raglan sweater i wanted to make a pattern that is a perfect first sweater that a person will knit either you are a beginner knitter or have some experience but never dared to make something bigger the knitting club sweater is a perfect match for you to make things even easier for you i made a full video tutorial for this pattern that will walk you through from the cast on until the bind off you will find the link to the video tutorial in the notes section have fun do share the photos of your sweater in the social media and don t forget to tag me - @bareknit in your post sizes 1 2 3 4 5 finished bust 98 103 109 116 123 cm circumference 38 5 40 5 43 45 75 48 5 intended to be worn with 10 to 20 cm / 4 to 8 ease to pick your best size measure your full bust and add your desired ease then pick the finished bust circumference closest to that number sample shown in size 2 with 17 cm / 6 75 positive ease on a woman who is 177 cm / 5 8 tall yarn dk weight wool yarn 500 550 600 650 650 g suggested yarn peer gynt from sandnes garn colorway 1044 natural with tutti frutti tweed gauge 18 sts & 26 row = 10 cm / 4 measured over stockinette stitch in the round after blocking the needle size is only a guideline if you get a gauge with more than the provided stitches you should switch to a bigger needle size if you get a gauge with less than the provided stitches you should switch to a smaller needle size it is smart to always make a swatch to check the gauge before starting on the garment as everyone knits differently 2 all images illustrations and text © bare knit the knitting club sweater - details - needle size main fabric 4mm / us 6 - 75cm/30 and 30cm/14 circular ribbing 3 5mm / us 4 - 30cm/14 circular notions 8 stitch markers one of them should be unique stitch holders or waste yarn abbreviations round/s - round/s rs - right side bobble - bind off ssk - slip 2 sts knit-wise to the right hand bor - beginning of round needle knit them together as one 1 stitch co - cast on decreased dpn/s - double pointed needle/s st/s - stitch/es increase/ d - increase/d ws - wrong side k - knit k2tog - knit 2 stitches together as one 1 stitch decreased m1l - make one increase that leans to the left by picking up the thread between two stitches from in front and knitting the new stitch twisted through
